actions.name: Indomitable

cost.trigger: The user's Activation ends and they have Stages less than their default.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user's Activation ends and they have Stages less than their default.

Effect: The user's negative Combat Stages are set to their default.

system.description:
Trigger: The user's Activation ends and they have Stages less than their default.

Effect: The user's negative Combat Stages are set to their default.
